description: A calm, shared watchlist PWA designed to help couples decide what to watch together without endless scrolling or algorithmic pressure.
name: hearthMVP

description: no punchbacks
name: punchbuggy

description: A data driven research project exploring the economic, social, and institutional decoupling shaping the modern world. Combines a concise policy brief, a long form narrative essay, and an interactive visual infographic, all deployed as a single static site via GitHub Pages.
name: great-decoupling

description: JobQuestOS is a personal operating system for job searching—designed to replace overwhelm with structure. It breaks the search into daily, repeatable actions, tracks progress, and keeps focus on what actually moves interviews forward.
name: JobQuestOS

description: Ecological Constellation maps Big Five personality traits into a ranked constellation of animal-based ecological strategies. Instead of assigning a single type, it highlights patterns of social energy, cooperation, planning, exploration, and threat sensitivity across contexts.
name: ecological-constellation

description: A lightweight React + Firebase app for tracking daily pushups during the PushUp Challenge. Supports training and official phases, streaks, leaderboards, and real-time sync. Built with Tailwind for a clean, motivating mobile-first experience.
name: the-pushup-challenge-2025

description: Mobile-first PWA for daily domains (Sleep, Fitness, Mind, Spirit). Lightweight logging with trend-aware, realism-first scoring (no perfect 100), automated backups, editable history, and auto-update/versioning. Surfaces practical insights and vision goals to support steady habits, recovery, and long-term growth.
name: drop

description: An interactive narrative engine inspired by Vikings-era realism. This project blends historical fiction, player-driven choice, and consequence-based storytelling without stats or gamification. Built for slow-burn immersion, social pressure, and emergent character arcs.
name: LothbrookLore

description: Fast, narrative-driven travel photo organizer. Sort your trip photos by story role (establishing, people, culture, action, mood) with single keystrokes. Day-based organization, reversible operations, slideshow-ready exports. Local-first, offline-only, zero vendor lock-in. Built for photographers who value speed and control.
name: Narrative

description: A living planning system for family formation, income resilience, and child development in high cost environments. Combines values, timelines, risk buffers, and projections to support long horizon decisions around housing, childcare, education, and career growth.
name: FamilyPlan

description: Project Loki is a mission to help individuals reclaim agency in a world shaped by algorithms. By revealing the subtle forces that nudge behavior, it equips people to rise above digital determinism and become deliberate architects of their own lives.
name: Project-Loki

description: A visual and analytical exploration of how motivation, reward, and curiosity flow through daily life — part map, part experiment, part toolkit.
name: dukkha

description: Collections of writings
name: Schreiben

description: Backup from 2025 Arbeit
name: Arbeit_2025

description: Project Orion is a mythic, adaptive Core Map that guides users through symbolic life stages. Blending archetypal Gates, personality modes, and tonal layers, it powers soul-centered journeys through immersive, interactive UX grounded in psychology, story, and self-discovery.
name: Orion

description: A free, offline-first PWA for wrestlers to log practices, track progress, earn badges, and generate motivational AI prompts. Built with pure HTML/CSS/JS, IndexedDB storage, and service workers. No accounts, no costs, just honest support for your training journey.
name: wrestlePWA

description: “Portfolio of Benjamin P. Haddon — showcasing live projects at the intersection of research, storytelling, and technology. From data-driven systems to mythic narratives, these builds reflect a commitment to clarity, design, and meaning in both professional and creative work
name: Portfolio

description: A living archive and research framework for revisiting, reclaiming, and reapplying past knowledge — bridging memory, culture, and modern inquiry.
name: sankofa

description: QRs for CVs
name: CV_QR

description: A structured, professional system for consulting interview prep. Includes frameworks, industry cheat sheets, practice cases, math templates, behavioral stories, and session logs for clear, repeatable, high-quality case practice and continuous improvement.
name: consulting-prep-system

description: Casebreaker Chronicles is an RPG-style consulting training system that turns case interviews into interactive missions. You learn frameworks, structure, math, and synthesis through story-driven quests set in a Toronto-inspired world. NPC partners, rivals, and clients challenge you while you level up your consulting skills.
name: CasebreakerChronicles

description: A comprehensive, interactive guide for personal and philosophical growth, inspired by the mythic journey of Luke Skywalker. This project transforms the archetypal Hero's Journey into a practical framework for self-discovery and spiritual development.
name: Skywalker

description: PoliVis is an open-source civic intelligence platform that helps people see politics clearly. It organizes data on politicians, parties, and policies into a transparent, accessible knowledge graph—turning civic information into civic vision.
name: PoliVis

description: backup of macros
name: macrosbackup

description: Reusable miniseries skeleton for Pixar’s Finding Nemo. Professor‑level act breakdowns (film + psychology), archetypes/themes mapping, and a polished HTML/CSS placeholder site with podcast scaffolding. Built to scale across films under the Movie Miniseries framework.
name: nemo

description: Preparation for Lifemark Senior Consultant Role
name: Lifemark_SnrConsultant

description: An interactive digital synopsis of Extreme Mass Homicide: From Military Massacre to Genocide (Dutton, Boyanowsky & Bond, 2005). This web-based project blends scholarly analysis with immersive storytelling, featuring accessible design, dual-tone content styling, interactive diagrams, and thoughtful UI/UX for serious historical material.
name: Ares

description: Project Agoge is a narrative research project exploring how boys become grounded, resilient men through transformational rites. It blends deep cultural history, psychology, myth, and practical frameworks into a podcast and supporting documents that reimagine meaningful initiation for today’s world.
name: agoge

description: A minimal, client-side fitness intelligence system that translates physiology into insight. STARK maps strength, endurance, recovery, and vitality through clean design and transparent analytics — a calm, data-driven mirror for your body and motivation.
name: STARK

description: Analyze your listening history to map subconscious emotional patterns—Project Orpheus turns musical obsessions into insights
name: orpheus

description: •BE• (Black Excellence) is a lightweight single-file app and research project celebrating African-American comedy cinema. It combines a curated film list, local watchlist tracking (ratings, notes, watched toggle), and cultural context — honoring laughter as both entertainment and legacy.
name: BE

description: Vox is a lean, offline-first vocabulary tracker designed for focused study in Spanish and Mandarin. Featuring CSV import and export, practice counters, and responsive table and card views, making it easy to manage and review progress.
name: Vox_Showcase

description: Project Vox: Vocab Tracking. A dual-interface language learning tool with desktop table view and optimized mobile card layout. Features CSV import/export, real-time editing, progress tracking, and bilingual support for Spanish/Mandarin. Includes translation columns, status management, and practice counters with automatic device detection.
name: Vox

description: Created with StackBlitz ⚡️
name: backup_portfolio

description: Filmseele: Pinocchio — an  immersive, museum-grade site for Pinocchio (1940) transforms its moral journey into a guided exhibit. It's style-first, blending calm precision, cinematic restraint, and woodcraft hints with a refined Pinocchio-inspired palette for a beautiful, engaging user experience.
name: pinocchio

description: A retro-inspired text RPG where your story shapes — and secretly reveals — your psychological profile. Decisions guide the plot and quietly measure traits like openness, risk tolerance, and attachment style, culminating in a personalized “Hero’s Chronicle” of mind and myth.
name: Janus

description: A living chronicle of psychological thought — unfolding through voices, stories, and shifting paradigms. Starts as a lean podcast, expands into a symbolic learning environment bridging past and present.
name: Psi

description: A living signal filter and cultural observatory that curates clarity from the world’s noise. Hermes tracks civilizational shifts through daily summaries, transforming global news into a ritual of awareness — minimalist, mobile, and meaning-driven.
name: Hermes

description: Testing Emergent out
name: Test_Vox

description: A dynamic tool that visualizes the brain’s hidden neurochemical shifts as a living spectrum of colours and movement. Users adjust dopamine, oxytocin, serotonin, and more to explore how chemical changes shape emotion, revealing new states through an interactive heatmap and intuitive sliders.
name: Iris

description: Chiron is a personal AI career coach system built for radical self-reflection, strategic growth, and accountability. It combines structured prompts, personality context, and weekly audits to help high-standards individuals overcome avoidance and take meaningful action.
name: Chiron

description: Template Repo - Use for new Projects
name: -Template-
